_README.description: Model metadata for Anthropic Claude API access.
_README.usage: Models listed here are exposed directly through the Anthropic provider. Aliases are case-insensitive.

field_descriptions.aliases: Array of short names users can type instead of the full model name
field_descriptions.context_window: Total number of tokens the model can process (input + output combined)
field_descriptions.max_output_tokens: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate in a single response
field_descriptions.supports_extended_thinking: Whether the model supports extended reasoning mode
field_descriptions.supports_json_mode: Whether the model can guarantee valid JSON output
field_descriptions.supports_function_calling: Whether the model supports function/tool calling
field_descriptions.supports_images: Whether the model can process images/visual input
field_descriptions.max_image_size_mb: Maximum total size in MB for all images combined
field_descriptions.supports_temperature: Whether the model accepts temperature parameter in API calls
field_descriptions.temperature_constraint: Type of temperature constraint: 'fixed' (fixed value), 'range' (continuous range), 'discrete' (specific values), or omit for default range
field_descriptions.intelligence_score: 1-20 human rating used as the primary signal for auto-mode model ordering
field_descriptions.allow_code_generation: Whether this model can generate and suggest fully working code

models.description: Claude Opus 4.1 - Most capable Claude model with frontier intelligence
Claude Sonnet 4.5 - World's best coding model with 30-hour autonomous operation, 200K context, 64K output
Claude Sonnet 4 - Hybrid reasoning model with extended thinking (200K context, 1M preview)
Claude 3.7 Sonnet - First hybrid reasoning model generally available
Claude 3.5 Haiku - Fast and cost-effective, text-only
